---
title: "Stir-fried Spicy Beef <br> 小炒牛肉"
categories: [Beef, Spicy]

---

### 🥣 Ingredients

| Ingredient | 用料 | Amount | 份量 |
|------------|------|--------|------|
| Yellow beef | 黄牛肉 | 250 g | 250克 |
| Ginger | 姜 | A small piece | 一小块 |
| Garlic | 蒜 | Half bulb | 半颗左右 |
| Oyster sauce | 蚝油 | 2 spoons | 2勺 |
| White pepper powder | 白胡椒粉 | A pinch | 少许 |
| Canola oil | 菜籽油 | As needed | 适量 |
| Small chili peppers | 小米辣 | 4 pieces | 4个 |
| Pickled peppers | 泡椒 | 1 handful | 一把 |
| Cilantro | 香菜 | A small bunch | 一撮 |

### 🍴 Steps
1. Slice the beef against the grain into thin pieces. Marinate with 3 spoons salad oil, 2 spoons of oyster sauce, a pinch of white pepper powder, and a little starch. Mix well, then add 1 more spoon of oil to lock in moisture.  
  黄牛肉逆着纹理切小片，加3勺色拉油、2勺蚝油、少量白胡椒粉抓匀，再加一点淀粉抓匀，最后再来一勺油抓一下锁水。
2. Mince the ginger, chop the chili peppers and pickled peppers into segments, and crush and chop the garlic.  
  生姜切小丁，小米辣（红色的）和泡椒切段，8颗蒜拍扁后切粒。
3. Heat a pan until smoking hot, then add oil. Stir-fry the beef with a pinch of salt until just cooked and remove quickly to prevent toughness.  
  锅烧热，要烧到冒烟再倒油，油热后倒入牛肉快速翻炒，加一点盐，变色就捞出，动作要快。
4. Cut cilantro into 3–4 cm segments.  
  香菜切成3–4厘米段，不要太长以免影响炒制时间。
5. In remaining oil, add ginger, garlic, and chilies. Stir-fry until fragrant, then add a dash of soy sauce.  
  锅里留些油，放入姜蒜辣椒爆香，加入少许生抽。
6. Return beef to the pan, toss briefly, then add cilantro and stir just until combined. Serve immediately.  
  倒入牛肉翻炒几下，再倒入香菜段，关火后快速翻炒均匀，出锅。
